name: PuzzleGame (Kiriton Lu)
description:
Title: Break bricks

Platform: PC 

Game Genre: Platformer 

Rating: E 

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers 

Game Overview:  Classic predownloaded game on mobile phone in my childhood. Move the bottom paddle to bounce the ball to break all the bricks

 Instructions: The goal is to break all the bricks. To start the game, left click. By using "left arrow" and "right arrow" to move the bottom paddle to bounce the ball back.

Hint: Press "0" to make the paddle follow the ball. (To test the game)

Game Design Team: Zhiyong Lu – Game Designer
